product_name: Lange SX 80 W Ski Boots - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: Combining a soft, intermediate-level flex with roomy footbeds, the Lange SX 80 W women's ski boots emphasize comfort as you explore new terrain and enjoy your time on the mountain. Roomy, 102mm footbeds offer a comfortable fit and can accommodate wide feet. Soft flex index provides a power transfer suited to new intermediate skiers looking to expand their skills. Shells are designed to create an upright, balanced stance on rockered skis to increase efficiency of technique and reduce fatigue. Uniform-density plastic shells ensure highly efficient power transfer, smooth flex and finely-tuned responsiveness, even in frigid temperatures. Liners comfortably contour your feet and precisely match the internal shape of the shells to create instant responsiveness; they may be custom molded using a heat treatment. Women-specific fit with anatomically shaped liners and upper cuffs accommodates narrow heels and low calf muscles. 1-piece toe boxes and tongues eliminate seams and overlaps in the tongue-attachment areas to reduce pressure points at the insteps and tops of the toes. Specially designed insteps provide an excellent fit at the midfoot, resulting in increased circulation and greater warmth. The Lange SX 80 W women's ski boots feature saddle-stitched seams to help reduce hotspots.
